original_title: Robin Morgan: What a Man, What a Man, What a Man, What a Mighty Good Man (Say It Again Now)
overview: 29 year old Welshman and "woke bloke" Robin Morgan explores what it means to be a father, and to have a father, to be a son and to have one. Crammed with childhood related chortles and self deprecating wit, Robin asks what on earth makes a good male role model? And why can't everyone have a best mate like Dave?
title: Robin Morgan: What a Man, What a Man, What a Man, What a Mighty Good Man (Say It Again Now)
